name: kinsfolk-republic-trading-journal-unified
description: Kinsfolk Republic Trading Journal - Unified Web & Desktop Application

scripts.sync:to-desktop: robocopy src desktop/src /MIR /XD node_modules .git && robocopy public desktop/public /MIR
scripts.sync:from-desktop: robocopy desktop/src src /MIR /XD node_modules .git && robocopy desktop/public public /MIR
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run desktop:build
scripts.update:desktop: npm run sync:to-desktop && cd desktop && npm run build && npm run electron-pack
